content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (34.5,-86.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All mining drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) containing iron and copper ore
- 2 Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5)
- Additional stone furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles creating power network

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Ensure mining drills and inserters have fuel before operation
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems to prevent "out of fuel" warnings

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Cannot extract from chests that are empty or don't contain the requested item
- Verify chest contents before attempting extraction

### Entity Placement Optimization
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper material flow
- Consider reorganizing belt systems to optimize material transport

### Fluid System Management
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections
- Verify fluid flow path from offshore pump through boiler to steam engine

### Space Management
- Some inserters report "output blocked" - ensure sufficient space in destination containers
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow conditions
